## Properties

| Property      | Attribute     | Description           | Type                                            | Default     |
| ------------- | ------------- | --------------------- | ----------------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `clickable`   | `clickable`   | Hover effect          | `boolean`                                       | `false`     |
| `compact`     | `compact`     | Compact style         | `boolean`                                       | `false`     |
| `description` | `description` | Description / summary | `string`                                        | `undefined` |
| `heading`     | `heading`     | Card heading          | `string`                                        | `undefined` |
| `subheading`  | `subheading`  | Card subheading       | `string`                                        | `undefined` |
| `variant`     | `variant`     | Special appearance    | `"default" \| "glass" \| "outline" \| "shadow"` | `'default'` |
